item.title: Unleashing the dragon: running MRtrix3 in Google Colab
item.description: A day in the life of browsers A random thought crossed my mind last week: with Javascript at the top of programming languages rankings and with so many notebook systems covering most needs, how far are we from doing almost everything in a browser? Do we actually want to do everything in a browser? Postponing the dystopian consequences to the next Black Mirror season, it is true that browsers have become so universal that it makes sense to give access to resources through them.
